server.objects

Class AssaultParty

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.objects.AssaultParty

  • public class AssaultParty
extends java.lang.Object
    Shared Region with methods used by the Master Thief and the Ordinary Thieves. This class is responsible for the management of the Assault Parties and the crawling movements of its thieves.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AssaultParty(int id, GeneralRepos repos)
      Assault Party initialization.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • AssaultParty

        public AssaultParty(int id,
                    GeneralRepos repos)
        Assault Party initialization. An id is given to the Assault Party, the array of thieves is initialized, and all the variables are set to their initial values.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the Assault Party
        repos - GeneralRepos object for logging

    • Method Detail

      • getThieves

        public int[] getThieves()
        Get Array of thieves IDs in the Assault Party.
        Returns:
        Array of thieves IDs

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Get the ID of the Assault Party.
        Returns:
        ID of the Assault Party

      • addThief

        public void addThief(int thiefID,
                     int displacement)
        Add a thief to the Assault Party. This method adds a thief to the thieves array, in the first empty position. The thief is added as a Mapping.
        Parameters:
        thiefID - ID of the thief to be added
        displacement - Displacement of the thief to be added

      • resetAssaultParty

        public void resetAssaultParty()
        Reset the Assault Party. This method resets the Assault Party, setting all the variables to their initial values.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • sendAssaultParty

        public void sendAssaultParty()
        Send an Assault Party. This method is called by the Master Thief, and tells the Ordinary Thieves to start crawling. The Master Thief goes to the DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO state.

      • reverseDirection

        public void reverseDirection()
        Reverse the direction of the crawling. This method is called by the Ordinary Thieves and, when called by the last thief, it triggers the crawling out movement. The Ordinary Thief goes to the CRAWLING_OUTWARDS state.

      • crawlIn

        public void crawlIn(int roomDistance,
                    int displacement)
        Crawl towards the room of the Museum. This method is called by the Ordinary Thieves, and makes them crawl from position 0 to the room's distance. The Ordinary Thief goes to the CRAWLING_INW repos.setAssaultPartyID(id); repos.setOrdinaryThiefAssaultPartyID(thiefID, id);ARDS state.

      • crawlOut

        public void crawlOut(int roomDistance,
                     int displacement)
        Crawl towards the Collection Site and leave the Museum. This method is called by the Ordinary Thieves, and makes them crawl from the room's distance to position 0. The Ordinary Thief goes to the CRAWLING_OUTWARDS state.
